dialogue: You gotta say it, man! Like we rehearsed!
Quinn, when you rehearse something alone, it's not reasonable to expect me to...–
Let's take it from the top. Hey best bud!
You nailed it! Just like we rehearsed.
You calling for anything in particular?
I hang up. Despite missing every rehearsal, Steve nailed it on the second try. He must just be a natural performer.
